page.title: 01Summary of the Area
page.content: This section contains the small market town of Saxmundham (population 2371 ) and the villages of Benhall (441) with Sternfield (113). The sixteen farms are mostly arable and only a few have milk cows or steers for fattening. Saxmundham is bisected by the busy A12; a by-pass is now to be included in the 1986-87 road works. The single track rail links with Ipswich and Lowestoft, with a line to Sizewell Halt for nuclear waste collection. The population virtually stationary, was boosted in 1970-71 when an estate of 160 houses was built for American Airforce families. Sternfield House hosts members of the Royal Family when they visit Suffolk ae owner works in the Queen's household.
